title: Allows boards of education to provide certain children transportation to school for a lesser distance than two miles
summary: Allows boards of education to provide transportation to and from school for a child for a lesser distance than two miles if the parent or guardian of the child has a physically limiting disability which renders him or her unable to accompany the child to and from school.
